courses.name: Build Your Own Website
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to building websites from scratch
courses.schedule: Every Monday and Wednesday, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM
courses.prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS

syllabus.content: Learn the basics of HTML
Understand CSS fundamentals
Explore responsive design techniques
Integrate JavaScript into your website
Learn about deployment strategies for websites

courses.name: Mastering Python
courses.description: Unlock the full potential of Python programming language
courses.schedule: Every Tuesday and Thursday, 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM

syllabus.content: Cover the basics of Python programming language
Learn about control flow statements in Python
Understand functions and their usage
Explore various data structures in Python
Learn how to handle files in Python
Understand modules and packages in Python
Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python
Learn about error handling techniques in Python
Explore advanced topics in Python programming

courses.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.description: Get started with machine learning concepts and algorithms
courses.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Python and linear algebra

syllabus.content: Explore the basics of machine learning
Understand supervised learning algorithms
Learn about unsupervised learning techniques
Explore methods for evaluating machine learning models
Learn techniques for feature engineering in machine learning
Understand deployment strategies for machine learning models

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence for Beginners
courses.description: Understand the basics of AI and its applications
courses.schedule: Every Monday and Wednesday, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM

syllabus.content: Explore the fundamentals of artificial intelligence
Understand popular machine learning algorithms
Learn about processing natural language with AI
Explore computer vision techniques

courses.name: Data Science Essentials
courses.description: Learn essential tools and techniques for data analysis
courses.schedule: Every Tuesday and Thursday, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM
courses.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Python and statistics

syllabus.content: Get introduced to the field of data science
Learn techniques for data wrangling
Explore data visualization methods
Understand the basics of machine learning
Learn methods for evaluating machine learning models

courses.name: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
courses.description: Dive deeper into JavaScript with advanced topics and techniques
courses.schedule: Every Monday and Wednesday, 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM

syllabus.content: Explore advanced techniques for DOM manipulation
Learn asynchronous programming in JavaScript
Understand new features introduced in ECMAScript 6
Explore various design patterns in JavaScript
Learn functional programming concepts in JavaScript

courses.name: iOS App Development
courses.description: Create stunning iOS apps from scratch using Swift programming language
courses.schedule: Every Wednesday and Friday, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM

syllabus.content: Get introduced to the Swift programming language
Learn about designing user interfaces for iOS apps
Explore methods for data persistence in iOS
Understand networking concepts in iOS development
Learn about deploying iOS apps to the App Store

courses.name: Game Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of game development with Unity and C#
courses.schedule: Every Tuesday and Thursday, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM

syllabus.content: Get introduced to the Unity game engine
Learn about designing game mechanics
Explore graphics and animation in game development
Understand the role of physics in game development
Learn about deploying games to various platforms
